beginTimestamp().notice: timestamp of when the challenge starts in UNIX epochal

challengeId().notice: unique ID of the coding challenge

depositAmount().notice: amount of tokens to deposit to be subscribe to the challenge

endTimestamp().notice: timestamp of when the challenge ends in UNIX epochal

isClaimed().notice: flag that indicates whether or not

isCompleted().notice: flag that indicates whether or not someone has already won the challenge

isSubscribed(address).notice: indicates whether or not an address is subscribed to the challenge or not

numberOfSubscribers().notice: number of participants that are subscribed;

winner().notice: address of the winner of the challenge

documentation.text: @notice unique ID of the coding challenge
